author: Simon Difford
description: Drambuie adds herbal consistency to this minty fresh aged rum Daiquiri.
name: Daiquiri Noir
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker
